PassiveDesc.Name: Eye of Death
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice gain +1 Power. At the end of each Scene, gain 3 "Focus". (Max 8. At 8 stack, Double the Power of next Offensive Dice with more than 8 natual roll. Afterwards clear all stacks)

PassiveDesc.Name: Poised Breathing
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restore 1 Light upon using a page whose original Cost is 3.

PassiveDesc.Name: Deflect Assault
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per Scene, respond to a one-sided attack with a Block die [Roll: 2-6]. (Not played in clashes where both characters use a Combat Page). Repeat twice for each Speed Dice unused in this Scene. Winning clashes with Block dice gain 1 "Focus"

PassiveDesc.Name: Kizuna
PassiveDesc.Desc: After an ally dies, gain 1 Strength and 1 Endurance each Scene for the rest of the Act. (Stacks up to two times)
